episodes.title: Matiang'i: Shakahola warning was raised in 2023, a NIS report was done & someone didn't do their job
episodes.description:
Matiang'i: Shakahola warning was raised in 2023, a NIS report was done & someone didn't do their job

The warning shots on Shakahola were fired in 2023 over fishy activies happening in Shakahola. I was not the CS Interior in 2023. There was even a NIS report done on the matter and somebody did not do their job. - Fred Matiang'i, 2027 Presidential Hopeful.

#TheInsight #TruthHasANewAddress

episodes.title: Pastor Paul Mackenzie's laws in Shakahola narrated by Francis Wanje | #InTheNameOfGod
episodes.description:
Pastor Paul Mackenzie's laws in Shakahola narrated by Francis Wanje | #InTheNameOfGod

In Francis Wanje's narration, Pastor Paul Mackenzie operated like the Law in Shakahola, he took custody of the man who has alerted Wanje of the situation and subjected him to torture. At this point in time, Pastor Paul Mackenzie was the authority over life, death and access to heaven for all those wo belived in his doctrine. 

#InTheNameOfGod #Shakahola

episodes.title: Another Shakahola Cult? 11 Suspects found near Shakahola forest arraigned in Malindi Law Court
Faith Betrayed: The cult crisis uncovered
episodes.description:
As Kenya continues to mourn the Shakahola tragedy, another suspected cult has been uncovered this time in Rongo Town, Migori County. Two people died and 57 others, including children, were rescued from disturbing conditions in Melkio St. Joseph Missions of Messaiha Afrika Church .

In this urgent and revealing interview, Rev. Charles Moses Isaboke sheds light on the rise of cults in Kenya, how they manipulate faith, and what the Church, government, and citizens must do to fight back. The exploitation must end—and it starts with awareness, action, and protection for the most vulnerable.
subjects: Melkio St Joseph Missions of Messiah Africa Church
